questions.question: 1. Which among the following represents a stack?

answers.a: People waiting at a counter, where the action of popping is when someone has been served at the counter
answers.b: A hand of bangles where pushing is wearing a new bangle
answers.c: A pile of plates at a dinner party

questions.question: 2. What is the time complexity of push operation in a stack? What is the time complexity of pop operation in a stack?

3. Consider these operations on an empty stack: push(3), push(5), pop(), push(10), push(11), pop(), push(100). What will be the stack configuration (first number is top of the stack, last is the bottom)
